GSD.description:
net: usb: ax88179_178a needs FLAG_SEND_ZLP

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.15 by commit f8bfce2177cdd64357dd57b8f43154f236d25f51. For more details please see the references link.
